LightningComponentBundle.masterLabel: Custom Review Screen For Scheduler Flow
LightningComponentBundle.description: Displaying Service Appointment Fields includes Custom Fields, and Output JSON Text format which can be used on Save Appointment Element

property.name: excludedFields
property.label: Excluded Fields
property.description: Excluded Field for Review Screen. Input API name separated comma without space i.e. Comments,AdditionalInformation,IsAnonymousBooking,EngagementChannelTypeId

property.name: serviceResources
property.label: Service Resources Variable
property.description: Set {!serviceResources} variable if Multiresource is enabled, if not, set {!ServiceResourceId} from Flow

property.name: showServiceResources
property.label: Show Service Resources
property.description: Show Service Resources Info. Set {!$GlobalConstant.True} or false. Default is false.

property.name: showMap
property.label: Show Map
property.description: Show map by address. Set {!$GlobalConstant.True} or false. Deafault is false.

property.name: leadRecord
property.label: Lead Record
property.description: Set {!Lead} if this appointment is for Guest Booking
